msbt.message: I haven't had a chance to talk with yet. Have you?I hope we meet soon, .
Guess what 's been up to
Guess what got up to the other day?
I just realized that I haven't seen recently.They say no news is good news but Well, I just hope they're OK.
I saw out and about today.Not sure what they were up to exactly, but it looked like they were having fun, .
So, I saw out and about yesterdayI'm not sure what they were up to, .
I think it's been a couple of days since I've seen .Hope they're OK,
You know from , right?
So, recently I saw from
I wonder what is up to, lately?If you happen to run into our friend from , please tell them I said "hi."
So, how long have you known your friend , from ?I was just wondering because you seem to know each other well
How's that friend of yours from doing?You and get along well,
Since meeting , I've thought a lot about What it might be like there, how far away their island is Maybe I'll see it for myself someday, .
I wonder how is doing, now that they went back to ?Do you think they wonder about their friends?
I heard they were so busy the other day here that they might not have taken a break to eat, .I should have offered them a snack, shouldn't I? Why do I only realize these things when it's too late?
I heard they're great at fishing, maybe even as good as you!Oh! I didn't mean to compare you like that, I just heard they caught a lot of fish.
They must really know their way around a net. I heard they caught so many bugs, ! Guess we've got some competition!
I heard they picked the beach here clean of shells, one after another!What a display of beachcombing that must've been, !
I heard they went clamming and dug up a major haul!They must have some real clamming skills. I've read one trick is to watch for water squirting from the sand
Did you hear about all the balloons they managed to shoot down with their slingshot, ? Talk about good aim!
I overheard them making wishes on every shooting star they saw that night, .I'm not sure if they were feeling lucky, or desperate
There was all this loud rustling. Then I heard they'd been shaking every single tree they could.If it were me, I'd be worried about shaking loose a wasp nest and getting myself stung, .
I heard they were chopping trees all over the island, probably gathering wood for a DIY project, . Wonder what they were making
I heard they chopped down enough trees that they had to have worn out their axe, !
I heard they spent a good, long while planting, . They must like gardening too.
I saw watering all our flowers for us!That was so sweet of them, but I should really pitch in and do my share,
I heard they were being super emotive, reacting to absolutely everything that anyone did I guess they must have a dramatic streak, .
They apparently kept leaving the island and coming back, over and over again.Just imagine being as well travelled as that,
Did you hear had company from off-island?That might explain all of our recent airport traffic,
They must've felt the crafting urge, because I heard they worked on a zillion DIY projects, !I was inspired to craft something of my own after hearing about it!
They must have been extra busy with island chores, because I heard they wore out a lot of tools. It'd make me sad if so many of my tools broke on the same day like theirs did, .
I heard they stayed inside for what seemed like forever, .I'm so curious about what they were up to in there Is that nosy of me?
I was shocked when I heard how long they were outside, !Nothing wrong with getting some fresh air, but everyone has to go home and rest sometime, right?
I hear they were digging pits all over the island, . I just hope I don't fall in one of them
I felt so bad for them when I heard that they kept falling into pit after pit, If you see them, please tell them that hopes they're OK.
I heard that they've been putting a lot of effort into redecorating their home, ! Now I'm considering doing the same. I guess maybe I'm inspired by that level of dedication.
I heard they spent a long time working out a custom design on their phone, I get that. When inspiration strikes, you have to act on it while it's still fresh in your mind!
They stopped me to chat so many times! I'm not sure I've ever talked with them so much, .I feel like we got to know each other better, though. So that's nice.
I heard they practically talked 's ears off!I honestly felt a little left out, so it feels good that you want to talk to me now,
I heard they were extra sociable, stopping everyone to talk, but more importantly to listen, !Good listeners are rare, but everyone likes being heard. That's why I love talking to you, .
I felt so bad for them when I heard how many times they got stung!It sounds like the wasps had it out for them, So scary!
I heard they shook a wasp nest loose from a tree and got swarmed!Bet it still stings,
I hear they've been putting an awful lot of work into digging up fossils lately, .I wonder what kinds of fossils they've been able to discover
I heard they were smashing rocks over and over with their shovel, , shearing chunks off. Stone bits were flying everywhere, so everyone kept their distance.
There's a rumor that they buried Bells somewhere on this islandImagine being rich enough to have Bells to bury, !
Supposedly whenever anyone sees them lately, they're shaking fruit loose and collecting it, . I wonder if they're planning some kind of fruit-based DIY project?
I heard they were constantly taking out their phone, like they kept having to look something up, .I do that sometimes myself, like when I'm trying to keep in mind what I need for a DIY project
I heard they stood around staring at their phone for so long that their eyes must've hurt, .
Rumor is that they were super busy building roads all across the island!It must've been exhausting, but also inspiring in a way, .
I heard they were digging out lots of new waterways, What do you think made them work so hard like that all of a sudden?
Talk is they were hard at work moving earth around and making cliffs around here, .I bet it felt good to look around and see changes they made to the island.
I heard they did a lot of fencing— building them, taking them downWish I was that handy, .
Seems they've been doing a lot of outdoor decorating, !It's hard enough trying to decorate the inside of my home. Exterior decorating seems next-level to me.
I heard they racked up a bunch of Nook Miles in just one day. That's not easy to do, . I wonder if they were just hurrying to pay off their mortgage, or if they had other plans for those Miles?
Seems they were all smiles coming out of Resident Services I heard they managed to pay off a big loan. I bet that grin could be used in dictionaries next to the definition of "smile," !
They were supposedly patronizing Nook's Cranny a lot, .They must've had a lot on hand to sell, and a lot of things to buy.
It turns out that the island tune we were listening to the other day was a suggestion by .I'm glad to have neighbors with such great taste in music, !
I hear they designed a brand-new flag for our island, !Wish I had enough confidence in my designs to share them around
I hear they used a wand to change up their outfit, just like that! Neat trick if you ask me, .
I hear they were jumping back and forth over rivers with a vaulting pole, like it was no big deal, . I guess it got them where they needed to go, though
Rumor is that they bought up every available turnip, .Oh no! What if they're trying to corner the stalk market?!
I heard they sold off all their turnips while prices were high, and made a small fortune, !Almost makes the stalk market sound attractive, until I remember that I'm no turnip-futures expert.
I kept hearing a familiar voice, and realized it was .They had a LOT to say, !
I heard they pulled up tons of weeds! Almost like they were going for some kind of island record,
Have you seen their new 'do, ?I hear they look a bit different now, but in a really good way, you know?
They supposedly changed up their look, .If you ask me, will still be no matter what they look like.
They must've taken up photography, because I hear they're snapping tons of photos, ! I hope they don't catch me looking goofy in any of their pictures
